  1. import re
  3. from django import template
  4. from django.conf import settings
  5. from django.core.urlresolvers import reverse, NoReverseMatch
  7. register = template.Library()
  9. @register.simple_tag(takes_context=True)
  10. def active(context, pattern_or_urlname):
  11. """Tag provide active class for menu elements"""
  12. try:
  13. pattern = '^' + reverse(pattern_or_urlname)
  14. except NoReverseMatch:
  15. pattern = pattern_or_urlname
  16. path = context['request'].path
  17. if re.search(pattern, path):
  18. return 'active'
  19. return ''
